import React, { useState } from 'react' import '../style/cart.css' import '../style/index.css' import CartTableHeader from './CartTableHeader' const CartProducts = () => { let subtotal = 1789 const [qtyIncrese, setQtyIncrease] = useState({ counter: '1', }) const qtyHandlerPlus = () => { let numberCnvrt = parseInt(qtyIncrese.counter) numberCnvrt = numberCnvrt + 1 subtotal = subtotal * numberCnvrt setQtyIncrease({ counter: numberCnvrt.toString(), }) subtotal = subtotal.toString() console.log(subtotal) } const qtyHandlerMinus = () => { let numberCnvrt = parseInt(qtyIncrese.counter) numberCnvrt = numberCnvrt - 1 if (numberCnvrt > 0) { setQtyIncrease({ counter: numberCnvrt.toString(), }) } } return (
